documents.document: @101greatgoals congrats Wayne you broke a pretty average goal record at your club. Come back to me when you get 100 more.

Does anyone know if there's any truth in the rumour Artie Burns is still looking for @Edelman11 after missing that tackle.
#Patriots
@GaryLineker come on now Gary everyone does it at this stage. FA Cup is behind the capital one cup these days. It's not magical anymore
Link dropped as the second went in. Probably for the best
@absentmindednss yeah tried that one I found a random link that was something else but brought up BT 2
Utterly shocking defence no other way to put it, but seriously have we got one close offside decision I'm our favour this season.
It's almost getting hard not to laugh
Anyone have a stream for the game? All the BT Sports 2 ones on Mobdro are showing BT Sports 1
Hon the Rafa!!!
@football_ie they balls they had to play with it wouldn't be suprised.
@102greatgoals @101greatgoals how is this news worthy. He's right none of the current Arsenal squad are better than the 3 people he named.
@steviemckinlay @Patriots @LFC @billbarnwell I will check him out thanks.

Can't help but notice I'm listening to a lot of podcasts and reading a lot of articles on @Patriots instead of @LFC at the moment
#Patriots
@mattladson despite a that we dominated massive parts of that game. Should have won and didn't it was just not great
@mattladson Milner had a dreadful first 15 and I though Arnold struggled a bit tonight. Can was awful so was Firmino
@mattladson I thought first half we were very loose at the back. Matip was rusty Lovren looked like the lad who played with Skrtel
Could have been a peno ended up a great finish at the other wns
Great finish.
While id struggle to pick a liverpool player MOTM from the team that have barely left their half in 90 minutes
Some will say Southampton deserve to go through, truth is they didn't. Large portions of both games, they just played less bad than us.
Coutinho looked shattered but not sure coming off was the best thing
Meanwhile a minute since this free kick was given away
Well Long moved his hand towards the ball there.
We could be here till the Capital One cup final and wouldn't score
Hard to score against bad teams when they park the bus, let alone a decent one. Especially when it looks like we have no legs.
One Southampton player has been in the Liverpool half in the last 5 minutes.
Firmino largely awful since drink driving charge and burglary, or since he lost the top knot. I reckon the top knot.
@GaryStew1980 theirs
Southampton look more dangerous with 2 players in our half than we do with 10 in there's.
We may not score tonight.
He will get slaughtered but that was a tougher chance, still should have done better.
What a miss, on a side note Southpool have clearly figured out our corner signals.
Time for Origi and Winjaldum? We just lost penos after that save.
"Wasn't close to going over the line" Alan Smith, ladies and gentlemen after goal line technology is needed to see if ball crossed the line.
Terrible and phenomenal goal keeping on a matter of seconds.
We've had about 4 offside goals against us this year you would think we would get lucky once.
Can needs a rest out of the spot light nothing working and looks more laboured than Gerrard did at the end. Forcing everything.
Matip trying too hard.
I know Depay is gone and we all had a good laugh at him but seriously Firmino you can start playing well again. Even if it means the topknot
Jesus Emre I just gave you some credit, since then you've given the ball away left behind by a not so fat player and headed out for a corner
Henderson just bottled a tackle there, very not like him.
Great bit of cover from Can
Even Matip looks all over the shop and Lovrens yips make it look like he was playing with Skrtel for the last 4 months
Team aren't giving them much to cheer about but sounds like fans used most of their energy outside the stadium welcoming the bus.
All 11 of Liverhamptons players were within 25 yards of their own goal for a good 2-3 solid minutes there. Unfortunately 9 of ours were too
Well done Emre finally a tackle not ending in a free.
Whole back 4 looks loose, Can doesn't know where he's supposed to be and Milner looks like he's having one
I like to support all our players as much as I can but what does Emre Can have to do to get dropped at the moment?
@Barca_Nigga @101greatgoals you want him you're paying big bucks, especially now with 5 years and no release clause.
@Barca_Nigga @101greatgoals not quite sure you get the point but not to worry buddy. I am of the school of thought everyone one has a pricr
@Barca_Nigga @101greatgoals ok so you didn't win anything so you were crap??? But now also not winning anything you are top 3? Great logic
@Barca_Nigga @101greatgoals roughly around the same time Barca were the top team in Spain if not the world. Different times maybe Madrid?
@Spursboy1231 @101greatgoals sorry thought you'd be smart enough to understand my point guess not.
@101greatgoals dick heads everywhere.
@101greatgoals let's be honest, there is likely to be small pockets of every fanbase who go to WHL doing the same no matter the club.
@JamieRoss7 I'd be more worried if I was him about his whole country calling him scumbag. I guess we're just different.
@LFCSpionKop we have been utterly blessed so far.
So far results have been very kind to us
@mattladson Klavan is a funny one, 90% of the time but when he has one he really, really has one. Matip really should have come in
@JohnBennettBBC @monkey_sponge considering his treatment I wouldn't bet on it
@itvfootball he's decent but he has no hope of getting into their Olympic diving team.
Back on the shelves @shanman99 https://t.co/euS7WPha1l
@Rainbow6Game @grahamtrd right we need to get back playing in time for this
@TeleFootball summer it was Man U or Liverpool now it's West Ham or West Brom
@BunsenTweets Birthday Burger earlier today still stuffed and still best burger in Dublin.
@foundersbrewing oh well guess I will jaunt have to drink two small ones
@foundersbrewing going to need that in ireland please.
@mattladson soared after its claimed "well you know that independent economy, it's not really a goer" so not much will actually change.
@offtheball I get what Pat Nevin is saying about Rooney warming up and working hard against Liverpool but only Pogba played worse.
@MiguelDelaney also love how much it winds people up
@MiguelDelaney @Independent by your point of view
@MiguelDelaney @Independent are the Indo going to let you engage on twitter as much as you do now? Even if I don't agree love that you stand
@In_Added_Time @monkey_sponge @ESPNFC that's one of those things people say that just aren't true.
@mattladson I am torn with dropping or playing Can was dreadful in then first game and again yesterday.
@BillyCampbell_1 @JamesPearceEcho not sure Sakhos position at lfc would be as dire had he not been banned
@BillyCampbell_1 @JamesPearceEcho he has certainly been punished for his discretion far more than UEFA or FIFA
@BillyCampbell_1 @JamesPearceEcho no doubt but if you ban someone for a banned substance you should probably know if it is fully banned.
@BillyCampbell_1 @JamesPearceEcho again if they actually knew what they were at we wouldn't need to chase anything at all
@BillyCampbell_1 @JamesPearceEcho it's also not the first time in last 12 months the governing bodies of football who have cost us.
@BillyCampbell_1 @JamesPearceEcho look your are possibly right, probably more we could have done, however we aren't the only club impacted
@Kristian_Walsh @LivEchonews I think his short pass back must have played a part in your decision but made very few other mistakes.
@MrStephenHowson awww can't you make a point without swearing? Oh and I see you like to correct grammar, it's *knobhead. The more you know.
@mattladson say what you want about Whiskey Nose time there but at least his team had to score the odd goal not involving an offside.

@RorySmith more shots, more corners, more touches in their box.
Stop Jose you're embarrassing yourself https://t.co/LXBMQiwDkd
@KoptimusPrime that said we were poor in their box we had a good few chances we rolled back to De Gea
@KoptimusPrime first time in ages they come up against a decent side and they scrape a point to they didn't really deserve.
Man U very lucky to get a point here today. Lots of balls into the box but now too many clean chances in the end another offside decision
93rd minute you know it's coming
Very soft decision there in injury time
Herrera continues to be a piece of shit. Pulls a shirt then holds his face when pushed in chest.
8 mins injury time? It's Old Trafford after all
How many goals have Man U got this season where there was an offside involved? They even got a goal of the month.
Very much worried my prediction will be correct.
Don't remotely deserve it

Rooney not offside but Felani stoning right in front of the keeper was. I guess Neville couldn't see him past Alexander Arnold.
#manliv
Mignolet very close to being out of his box there kicking that.
Ok Rooney got away with one a few minutes ago expect a blatant elbow to lead to a Man U goal.
@LFCMostar @vine or the blatant intentional handball before it.
Mkhitaryan is very good at this football lark. He costs less than a 3rd of a Pogba, doesn't have a stupid haircut and doesn't dab bargain.
@5timesco petty he didn't. Karl kick it more it might have gone to Firmino
